                                                                        Hex-Dump Convarsion



Education: As follow-up to the meeting on national testing, DPC staff has begun to map out the
national strategy for helping students reach national standards in reading and math. One step
has been a meeting with the heads ofOSTP, NSF and the Education Department, to develop a
strategy for marshaling the resources of all federal agencies that can be effectively be focused on
helping students meet 8th grade international math standards. This interagency effort would be
led by the Education Department and the NSF, with the involvement ofDPC and OSTP. In
addition, these lead agencies will also map out a strategy for mobilizing the mathematical,
scientific and technical communities throughout the nation in support of reaching the 8th grade
math objective. The general intent is to launch an effort focused on 8th grade math
achievement, in support of improved teaching and learning in schools and the mobilization of
community resources beyond the schools, roughly comparable to America Reads. One short
term objective is to develop a Directive you can sign to initiate the interagency effort, and to use
as part of the announcement of a broader national strategy.
